course.subject: ENVR
course.name: Sustainable City
course.description: This course explores Sustainable Development in several cities: Hong Kong, Nansha District (Zhu-jiang Delta Region) and Taipei City. Students would travel to these cities and be immersed in local environment and culture to experience the city first-person and receive lectures on SD frameworks, theories and cases by leading faculties. Site and companies visits greatly enrich and broaden the learning experience.
